name: Project Inline
description:
Project InLine is fast-paced Racing, Sport and Adventure game, putting a big emphasis on freedom of movement and fun by adding the concept of gravity defying roller skates called G-LINES.

G-Lines comes from the word combination Graviton Gear and Inline Skates.

The Game is aimed at Kids and young adults as well as adults who might enjoy it themselves, but mostly to hardcore gamers who want challenges and very fast paced action.

This game is not a hand-holder, in the sense that, it is up to the player to figure out on his own special mechanics to better understand the game in his/her own way.

Support the project Development here: https://www.patreon.com/projectinline

Join Inline's discord server to be updated in real time! as well as discuss directly with the dev for suggestions and other:  https://discordapp.com/invite/WH9dNJx
